title: FU RIOT ON YOUR DODGE AND RATE SYSEM
body: One I'm a fucking newbie I'm sick of being called a POS by other players and reported for feeding this is a crock of shit!!! Either fix you unranked matchmaking or FUCK OFF YOU POS!!!! Second i'm trying to ban a player and your system won't let me then I get hit with a dodge timer!!! WTF!!!!! I work at a bank in algorithms in this type of systems of analytical systems, how can your devs not figures out the  proper rules, conditions and actions for their implemented decisions tables?{{champion:103}}

replies.body: newbie? You're level 54. You'd have to be playing straight for at least a few months.

Trying to ban a player? What do you mean? Your description of the events that transpired is very hard to follow. I can tell you were upset when you wrote this... Perhaps come back after cooling off and coherently explain wtf it is that you want. Not just I tried banning a player and now I got a dodge timer!!!! Lol I don't know how that could happen.

So you dodge a lobby and are upset? Or you dodged a lobby to fill a support ticket?

Take a moment to calm and then try explaining again.
Looks like an error on their end. I think a support ticket would work better.

1st of all, I understood everything you said.

Yes unranked MMR( or Match Making Rank) has always been  trash and will stay trash, you can get paired up against diamonds golds, plats, as a bronze, or not even lvl 30s to fight much experiences players,was talked about in the past and not a thing will change so yeah.

Client bugs, ever since they scrapped the previous client, the beta, it has had like more bugs and such since it's been created from scratch because they had forgotten how to deal with (members leavings and such secrets) yeah you're right for a billion $ company they sure are slow at these types of things, but stubborn to believe they can handle it all by themselves with few experienced staff, (also talked about in the past, still doesn't change)

It's best to move on, it's not worth getting emotional at this, you aren't going to get actual help at all from these naive, ignorant lads cause all the experienced players are gone, they were sick of ritos stuff, only a few remain, and this post will probably never see the light of day either if it's below -1 downvotes since rito <3s having player behavior boards filled with a mirage, farce illusion that it's godworks at all these 10 pages of upvotes.
